content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.0, 2.5)
- Steam engine at position (0.5, 6.5)
- Small electric pole at position (4.5, 6.5)
- Pipe system connecting the offshore pump to boiler and boiler to steam engine
- Coal mining drill at position (16.0, 0.0)
- Transport belt at position (16.5, 1.5) for coal output
- Transport belt system connecting coal drill to boiler
- Boiler inserter at position (-4.5, 4.5)

### Iron Mining and Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (15.5, 70.5) set to face right with drop position (17.5, 70.5)
- Stone furnace at position (16.0, 74.0)
- Burner inserter at position (16.5, 75.5) that moves iron plates from furnace to chest
- Wooden chest at position (16.5, 76.5) for iron plate storage
- Small electric poles connecting to power network

### Copper Mining and Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (-46.5, 70.5) with drop position (-46.5, 72.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-46.0, 74.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-46.5, 72.5) that moves ore from drill to furnace
- Burner inserter at position (-45.5, 75.5) that moves copper plates from furnace to chest
- Wooden chest at position (-45.5, 76.5) for copper plate storage
- Small electric poles connecting to power network

### Iron Gear Wheel Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (16.5, 80.5) set to produce iron gear wheels
- Inserter at position (16.5, 78.5) to feed iron plates into assembler from chest
- Inserter at position (16.5, 77.5) to take iron plates from storage chest
- Inserter at position (16.5, 82.5) for gear wheel output
- Wooden chest at position (16.5, 83.5) for gear wheel storage
- Small electric poles connecting to power network

### Copper Cable Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (-45.5, 80.5) set to produce copper cables
- Inserter at position (-45.5, 77.5) to feed copper plates from storage chest
- Inserter at position (-45.5, 82.5) for copper cable output
- Wooden chest at position (-45.5, 83.5) for copper cable storage
- Small electric poles connecting to power network

### Electronic Circuit Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (0.5, 80.5) set to produce electronic circuits
- Inserter at position (-2.5, 80.5) for iron plate input
- Inserter at position (3.5, 80.5) for copper cable input
- Inserter at position (0.5, 82.5) for electronic circuit output
- Wooden chest at position (0.5, 83.5) for electronic circuit storage
- Small electric poles connecting to power network

### Transport Belt Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (0.5, 90.5) set to produce transport belts
- Inserter at position (-2.5, 90.5) for iron plate input
- Inserter at position (3.5, 90.5) for iron gear wheel input
- Inserter at position (0.5, 92.5) for transport belt output
- Wooden chest at position (0.5, 93.5) for transport belt storage
- Small electric poles connecting to power network

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities with transport belts
- Transport belts cannot be connected directly to a Boiler, Chest, or Inserter as target/source. Always use an inserter as an intermediary between bel
